cite: Erev, I., Ert, E., Roth, A. E., Haruvy, E., Herzog, S. M., Hau, R., ... & Lebiere, C. (2010). A choice prediction competition: Choices from experience and from description. Journal of Behavioral Decision Making, 23(1), 15-47.
Hertwig, R., Barron, G., Weber, E. U., & Erev, I. (2004). Decisions from experience and the effect of rare events in risky choice. Psychological science, 15(8), 534-539.
Jessup, R. K., Bishara, A. J., & Busemeyer, J. R. (2008). Feedback produces divergence from prospect theory in descriptive choice. Psychological Science, 19(10), 1015-1022.

data_columns.subjID: A unique identifier for each subject in the data-set.
data_columns.opt1hprob: Possiblity of getting higher value of outcome(opt1hval) when choosing option 1.
data_columns.opt2hprob: Possiblity of getting higher value of outcome(opt2hval) when choosing option 2.
data_columns.opt1hval: Possible (with opt1hprob probability) outcome of option 1.
data_columns.opt1lval: Possible (with (1 - opt1hprob) probability) outcome of option 1.
data_columns.opt2hval: Possible (with opt2hprob probability) outcome of option 2.
data_columns.opt2lval: Possible (with (1 - opt2hprob) probability) outcome of option 2.
data_columns.choice: If option 1 was selected, choice == 1; else if option 2 was selected, choice == 2.
